overview: It was a sunny day when she walked into my office. Or was it cloudy? Rain or shine, she was gorgeous - drop dead gorgeous - and she wanted me to get the goods on her no-good cheating husband. No problem, I said, an open and shut case. Little did I know that I was about to embark on the wildest, wettest, wackiest case to ever test a private dick's sexual stamina... the case of Slick Honey. "A very sticky affair indeed." - From the Casebooks of Nick Slick, Private Dick
title: Slick Honey
